item.description:
Advance tickets are $40 each through Ticket Alternative; service fees apply. Ticket price includes:

* Entry into one session; 21+ w/ valid ID
* All 2oz beer tastings
* Fest guide
* Tasting cup
* Access to beer education seminars

Here's the current list of confirmed and interested breweries. Please check back often for updates as this is not a final listing; subject to change.

California: Anderson Valley Brewing Co.; Bear Republic Brewing Co.; Lagunitas Brewing Co.; Mad River Brewing Co.; Shmaltz Brewing Company (He'Brew); Sierra Nevada Brewing Co.; Stone Brewing Co.

Colorado: Avery Brewing Co.; Boulder Beer Co.; Flying Dog Brewery; Left Hand Brewing Co.; Odell Brewing Co.; Oskar Blues Brewery

Delaware: Dogfish Head Craft Brewery

Georgia: SweetWater Brewing Co.; Terrapin Beer Co.

Massachusetts: Berkshire Brewing Co.; Boston Beer Co.; Cambridge Brewing Co.; Cape Ann Brewing Co.; Cape Cod Beer; Harpoon Brewery; Haverhill Brewery / The Tap; Mayflower Brewing Co.; Mercury Brewing Co.

Maine: Allagash Brewing Co.

Maryland: Clipper City Brewing Co.

Michigan: The Livery

Missouri: Boulevard Brewing Co.; The Saint Louis Brewery (Schlafly)

New York: Brooklyn Brewery; Butternuts Beer & Ale; Ithaca Beer; The Matt Brewing Co.; Sixpoint Craft Ales; Southern Tier Brewing Co.

New Hampshire: Moat Mountain Smoke House & Brewing Co.; Portsmouth Brewery; Redhook Ale Brewery; Smuttynose Brewing Co.

North Carolina: The Duck-Rabbit Craft Brewery

Ohio: Hoppin' Frog Brewery

Oregon: Rogue Ales

Pennsylvania: Stoudts Brewing Co.; Victory Brewing Co.; Legacy Brewing Co.

Rhode Island: Coastal Extreme Brewing Co.; Narragansett Beer

Virginia: Williamsburg AleWerks

Vermont: Long Trail Brewing Co.; Magic Hat Brewing Co.; McNeill's Brewery; Otter Creek Brewing / Wolaver's
item.why: Join us in Boston for one of the East Coast's largest celebrations of American craft beer, featuring: 75 American brewers, ~300 craft beers, guest speakers, and more!
item.name: American Craft Beer Fest
